Package com.munger.passwordkeeper.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateFileFragment
    User interface used to gather information in creating a new passwordDocument
    ImportFileFragment
    Provides a file explorer for selecting a file to import.
    ImportFileFragment.DetailArrayAdapter
    An object to convert the file list in to a listView full of FileItemWidget views
    ImportFileFragment.MyFileItemWidget
    extention of the fileitem widget that adds fragment specific event handlers to the widget fileitemwidget display a file item in the directory with an icon and name.
    SelectFileFragment
    This fragment allows the user to select a file from the saved files directory and have the activity load it up
    ViewDetailFragment  
    ViewDetailFragment.DetailArrayAdapter
    Generator for widgets when a list view is assigned a list of password details pairs.
    ViewDetailFragment.PairDetailItemWidget
    A DetailItemWidget with data and event listeners added.
    ViewFileFragment
    Fragment used to view all the defined entries in a passwordDocument.
    ViewFileFragment.DetailListAdapter
    Class the populates the specified ListView with a collections of DetailsViews.
    ViewFileFragment.DetailView
    Modifies the existing TextWidget class to render its assigned details
